channel.title: Ultimate Fantastic Four on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Ultimate Fantastic Four on jverkamp.com

item.title: Ultimate Fantastic Four, Volume 6: Frightful
item.description:
Time travel! That never goes well.

Zombies! Also not great.

Lovecraftian chest busters! Now you’re just making things up.

A lot to put in one volume one again, but perhaps my favorite Fantastic Four thus far. Onward!

item.title: Ultimate Fantastic Four, Volume 5: Crossover
item.description:
After the mess of the last volume, it’s time to… turn up the wacky even more?

Time travel, parallel universes, super zombies, and Atlantis.

That is so much to fit into a single volume. No idea what will stick, but any one of those could carry a dozen volumes if not a series of their own… and they just keep doing it. Issue after issue.

Slow down!

Oy.

The zombie plague was pretty neat, not going to lie. I wonder if we’ll see more of that.

Onward!

item.title: Ultimate Fantastic Four Vol. 4: Inhuman
item.description:
Story the first:

New art. New baddie (once again fallout of the Baxter Building policies). Not the easiest story to follow.

Story the second:

Lockjaw. Inhumans. Introduced… and gone in an episode. Weird that.

Story the third:

Mole Man? Seriously

Three rather strange stories and not a real useful or reasonable change among them. Oy.

Onward to something better.

item.title: Ultimate Fantastic Four, Volume 3: N-Zone
item.description:
Very important things are happening!

They’re coming up with names?

But more seriously, it’s time to go back to the N-zone. And just maybe, find some answers. Or perhaps…

New “allies”?

It’s a fun adventure, if certainly a bit out there. The other Aires are all much more grounded.

Now I just want to know what’s next!

Onward.

item.title: Ultimate Fantastic Four, Volume 2: Doom
item.description:
That’s really it in a nutshell. Van Damme is back with changes of his own.

Makes for a much better villain than Mole Man, even if we’re only getting the beginnings now.

I’m hopeful

Onward!

item.title: Ultimate Fantastic Four, Volume 1: The Fantastic
item.description:
Reed, Sue, Johnny. Ben back at school. The gangs all here!

I have to admit, but a branch of the Marvel Universe I’m that familiar with. Looking forward to finding out!

Of course the first thing that has to happen is the accident…

It’s a bit quick we don’t really get time to even know Reed Richards, let alone the rest of them. I expect they’ll get some time to breathe as the series goes on.

Otherwise, it’s a weird mix of science and pseudo history. Pretty weird.

So far, I like the X-Men and Spider-Man better. But we’ll see.

Onward!
